resources.string: In the municipality of La Macarena, you can find different hotels starting from 55,000 (COP) Colombian pesos, with a wide variety of offers where the majority includes internet and meals.

Ca√±o Cristales is the main tourist attraction in the municipality of La Macarena, but its not the only one. This extensive area has a large portion of its territory within the AMEM (Special Management Area of La Macarena), representing admirable scenarios where Nature Tourism can be enjoyed.
